channel.title: How Do I Add A RandomBarrows?
channel.description:
I Need Help With Making A RandomBarrows Drop I Put This In Item.Java: [code] public static int randomBarrows() { return Barrows[(int)(Math.random()*Barrows.length)]; }[/code]
And Putted This With The Barrows Chest At Client.Java: [code]addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 1);[/code]
The Error:
[code]Item.java:655: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Barrows location: class Item return Barrows[(int)(Math.random()*Barrows.length)]; ^ Item.java:655: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Barrows location: class Item return Barrows[(int)(Math.random()*Barrows.length)]; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Files Compiled Successfully![/code]
And It Gives Error Idk What To Add More.
Plz Help,
~Metal K0

item.title: How Do I Add A RandomBarrows?

item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

TY NEWTY!!

IT WORKED!!

item.title: How Do I Add A RandomBarrows?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[CODE]
public static int Barrows[] = {4734,4710,4724,4726,4728,4730,4718,4718,4732,4736,4738,4716,4720,4722,4753,4747,4755,4757,4759,4708,4712,4714,4745,4749,4751,7462,7462,7462,7462,7462,7462,7462,7462,7462};

    public static int randomBarrows()
    {
        return Barrows[(int)(Math.random()*Barrows.length)];
    }[/CODE]

item.title: How Do I Add A RandomBarrows?
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

Did you try adding something like:

public int Barrows[] = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5};

Somewhere?
Right now you’re calling for a random variable that does not exist.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Add A RandomBarrows?
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

Well, it would be easier to read if you explained the error, and explained what part has gone wrong.
And don’t capitalize every letter starting in a new word, it gets annoying and hard to read.
I will be glad to help, just post what part you are having trouble with, and why you are having trouble with it.

Read full topic

I Need Help With Making A RandomBarrows Drop
I Put This In Item.Java:

And Putted This With The Barrows Chest At Client.Java:

addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 1);
